channel.title: Duelscape old school 474
channel.description:
[B]To start this project out this is based off rs2-server which is scu11 and vats worked on which is based off hyperion.
Base: Hyperion NOTE:This is not flaresoft not using canownueasy horrible codes Programmers:Only me
Current Features:
-Everything google features which is combat,cannon,fletching etc.
-Slayer workin 100% with tasks lvl req and slayer task resets
-Few places added slayer tower and fremmy dungeon for slayer npcs
-Membership system added into a few things (credits scu11,vats for mem system even added)
-Loading 317 maps due to issues with 508 maps
-Ava's working with saving arrows randomly and gives random metal
-All the combat bugs like dd diagonal are fixed
-Woodcutting and mining object respawn is fixed
-Clipping following perfect and its not scu11 its a different system
Media:[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2py5loy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i1lifp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/mmg7rn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2wd2ixz.png[/img]
Videos:Slayer showoff - [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1z1u6c9&s=7]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url] forgot to show level req.
Credits: Scu11 Vastico Graham[/B]

item.description:
@watscookin88 wrote:

I Vain I:

I’m not trolling or flaming you. I merely asked a question.

kk if this is ur question:I doubt you’re doing anything to this, besides downloading off r-s, starting a dev thread, then releasing.

if i did nothing i have half of the skills done that are needed
half of the slayer npcs done which isisnt much
some of the cb bugs which i doubt those flaresoft noobs even fixed but im not even using flaresoft
i have a slayer system which im showing off

lol? if you think thats nothing then idc really
